description: This file defines the Polymer behavior 'IronResizableBehavior' used for managing resize events among web components, including properties, event listeners, and methods for notifying and managing resizable elements.

methods.name: notifyResize
methods.description: Manually notifies the resizable element and its descendants of a resize event.

methods.name: assignParentResizable
methods.description: Assigns a parent resizable element to this element.

methods.name: stopResizeNotificationsFor
methods.description: Removes a descendant from resize notifications.

methods.name: resizerShouldNotify
methods.description: Determines if a nested element should be notified of resize events; can be overridden.

methods.name: _onIronRequestResizeNotifications
methods.description: Handles requests from descendants to be notified of resize events.

methods.name: _parentResizableChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the parent resizable element.

methods.name: _notifyDescendant
methods.description: Notifies a descendant element to resize.
